Posts.Content: Hi zaraza, I hope by now you have found a Dr, but in case you havent I have a wonderful breast surgeon. I live in central NJ in Hamilton area. My breast surgeon is Dr Lisa Allen at Capital Health in Hopewell NJ. I was treated for breast cancer there in 2014. She is a wonderful, caring, very informative Dr. Best wishes to you
Posts.Title: Need breast needle biopsy doctor
